Thank you for submitting your order!

What's next?

  1. Download the Lykke Wallet app for iOS or Android.
  2. Complete the KYC procedure. To begin, tap the button next to any fiat currency in the app.
  3. Make sure you're not a resident of one of these countries: China, South Korea, and any other jurisdictions where offering tokens of this nature may constitute a license requirement.
  4. Deposit fiat or crypto in your Lykke Wallet to get LKK2Y at the best price.
The token sale starts on December 12, 2017.
See you there!
